p: Among-population phenotypic differentiation estimates for plant height (0.23), plant stem diameter (0.25), and fresh and dry mass of flowers (0.12 and 0.14, respectively) were less than overall R ST (0.35), whereas P ST estimate for leaf width (0.39) and leaf length (0.41) exceeded the genetic differentiation at nine cpDNA microsatellite loci among the P. australis populations that were surveyed in the present study. P ST estimate for internode length (0.33) was comparable with among-population R ST estimate (0.35).
